mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_study (STUDY_NAME, STUDY_DESCRIPTION, LICENSE, ISPUBLIC, AUTHORS, PUBLICATION, CONTACT, SITE_COLLECTED, CREATED_BY,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_IP) VALUE (#{studyName}, #{studyDesc}, #{license}, #{isPublic}, #{authors}, #{publication}, #{contact}, #{siteCollected}, "User", NOW(), #{createdIp});
